property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionURL
property.description: JDBC connect string for a JDBC metastore

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionDriverName
property.description: Driver class name for a JDBC metastore

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionUserName
property.description: Username to use against metastore database

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionPassword
property.description: password to use against metastore database

property.name: hive.execution.mode
property.description: Expects one of [container, llap]. Chooses whether query fragments will run in container or in llap

property.name: hive.llap.execution.mode
property.description: Expects one of [auto, none, all, map]. Chooses whether query fragments will run in container or in llap
